item.title:
BREAKING NEWS
Tonight's AREA Pro Series season opener is postponed due to iRacing server attacks. Daytona is moved to next Thursday, replacing Texas. The Texas race is rescheduled to October 3rd. This situation is unfortunate, but fairness is our priority.

RED RIVER RIOT XXVI BREAKING NEWS
North Louisiana has been challenged to an exhibition crew battle by the East Texas invaders!
Drop by Cafe Boba Tea or just catch it om stream and see if we can defend this Saturday!!
Big shoutouts to @bargainETX for the baller graphic

#ShelleyDuvall #news #breakingnews #latest
RIP Actress Shelley Duvall, star of The Shining and Annie Hall, dies aged 75
Shelley died in her sleep of complications from diabetes at her home in Blanco, Texas, according to Dan Gilroy, who had been her life partner since 1989.
